meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Pelletier John Salmon Jamie Aliperti Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4445.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Jennifer Pelletier, a mother and small business owner from Norwalk, Connecticut
John Salmon, a computer programmer from Altadena, California
Jamie Aliperti, a legal aid attorney from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,600)

tr.td: ENGINEERING
WHICH TV SHOW CAME FIRST?
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
PATRON SAINTS
TOPLESS JEOPARDY!
"O" MY!
